doc:
Steven Daniel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steven_Daniel 0 Steven Tyrone Daniel (born in Hartford, Connecticut) is an American actor and musician. He is best known for his role as Lionel "El-Train" Johnson on the NBC Saturday morning sitcom City Guys. After City Guys ended in 2001, he guest starred in NYPD Blue and Charmed in 2002 and 2003, respectively. He also appeared in a few independent films; his last acting credit was in the film The Least Likely Candidate (2004). As a musician, Daniel released the gospel-influenced hip-hop album Hiphopcrisy (2001). Steven_Tyrone_Daniel ( born in Hartford , Connecticut ) is an_American_actor_and_musician . He is_best_known for his_role as Lionel_"_El-Train_"_Johnson on the_NBC_Saturday_morning_sitcom_City_Guys . After City_Guys ended in 2001 , he guest starred in NYPD_Blue and Charmed in 2002_and_2003 , respectively . He also appeared in a_few_independent_films ; his_last_acting_credit was in the_film The_Least Likely Candidate (_2004_) . As a_musician , Daniel released the_gospel-influenced_hip-hop_album_Hiphopcrisy ( 2001_) .
